org.opendaylight.controller.md.sal.common.api.data

接口 AsyncConfigurationCommitHandler<P extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.concepts.Path<P>,D>

  • 类型参数:
    P - Type of path (subtree identifier), which represents location in tree
    D - Type of data (payload), which represents data payload
    已过时。

    @Deprecated
public interface AsyncConfigurationCommitHandler<P extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.concepts.Path<P>,D>
    User-supplied participant in three-phase commit of transaction for configuration data tree.

    Client-supplied implementation of commit handler for subtree, which is responsible for processing CAN-COMMIT phase of three-phase commit protocol and return CommitCohort, which provides access to additional transitions such as PRE-COMMIT, COMMIT and ABORT.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static interface  AsyncConfigurationCommitHandler.ConfigurationCommitRequest<P extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.concepts.Path<P>,D>
      已过时。 
      Commit Request as was submitted by client code Commit Request contains list view of created / updated / removed path and read-only view of proposed client transaction, which may be used to retrieve modified or referenced data.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      CheckedFuture<AsyncConfigurationCommitCohort<P,D>,DataValidationFailedException> canCommit(AsyncConfigurationCommitHandler.ConfigurationCommitRequest<P,D> request)
      已过时。 
      Requests a can commit phase Implementations SHOULD NOT do any blocking operation during processing this callback.

    • 方法详细资料

      • canCommit

        CheckedFuture<AsyncConfigurationCommitCohort<P,D>,DataValidationFailedException> canCommit(AsyncConfigurationCommitHandler.ConfigurationCommitRequest<P,D> request)
        已过时。 
        Requests a can commit phase

        Implementations SHOULD NOT do any blocking operation during processing this callback. Implementation Notes

        • Implementation are REQUIRED to use request object for any data related access
        • Implementations SHOULD NOT use any other state stored outside configuration subtree for validation
        • Validation should happen asynchronously, outside callback call by updating returned CheckedFuture object.
        • If validation (CAN_COMMIT) phase:
          • is successful - invocation of CheckedFuture.checkedGet() on returned future MUST return AsyncConfigurationCommitCohort associated with request.
          • is unsuccessful - invocation of CheckedFuture.checkedGet() must throw instance of DataValidationFailedException with human readable explanaition of error condition.
        参数:
        request - Commit Request submitted by client, which contains information about modifications and read-only view as if transaction happened.
        返回:
        CheckedFuture which contains client-supplied implementation of AsyncConfigurationCommitCohort associated with submitted request, if can commit phase is successful, if can commit was unsuccessful, future must fail with TransactionCommitFailedException exception.
